sourcesContent:
import React, { lazy, useState} from 'react' import { CButton, CCard, CCardTitle, CCardBody, CCol, CFormFloating, CFormInput, CFormLabel, CFormSelect, CRow, CForm, CToast, CToastBody, CToastClose, } from '@coreui/react' const addApartment = (props) => { const[apt_no, setAptNo] = useState(0); const[block_no, setBlockNo] = useState(0); const[room_count, setRoomCnt] = useState(0); const[furniture_status, setFStatus] = useState("Furnished"); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const apartmentInfo = {apt_no, block_no, room_count, furniture_status, "occupancy":0}; fetch('http://localhost:8080/createApartment', { method:'POST', mode: 'no-cors', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'cache-control': 'no-cache', 'Access-Control-Request-Headers':'*', 'Access-Control-Request-Method':'*' }, body: JSON.stringify(apartmentInfo) }).then(() => { console.log(apartmentInfo); }) } const [toast, addToast] = useState(0) const toaster = useRef() const confirmationToast = (
Hello, world! This is a toast message.
) return (

Add Apartment

Fill details of the new Apartment setAptNo(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="integer" id="aptNo"/> Apartment Number setBlockNo(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="text" id="blockNo"/> Block Number setRoomCnt(parseInt(e.target.value))} type="integer" id="roomCount"/> Room Count setFStatus(e.target.value)} id="furniture"> Furniture Status addToast(confirmationToast)}>Submit
) } export default addApartment;
